verbose_text: ILC2 depletion impaired airway epithelial barrier integrity following influenza virus infection through a failure to generate hyper-plastic epithelial cells, an epithelial repair response, causing epithelial cells to undergo necrosis leading to deterioration of the epithelial lining.
evidence: ILC2 depletion impaired airway epithelial barrier integrity following influenza virus infection through a failure to generate hyper-plastic epithelial cells, an epithelial repair response, causing epithelial cells to undergo necrosis
